name: Leather FireFox Mask
description:
This is a brand new, exciting design; The FireFox. Created along the same lines as my very popular StormWolf, it's a fantasy fox with spiky fur and stylized ears.

Like all my work, this mask is hand carved from 8oz leather, shaped without a mold or form, & painted with a combination of colorfast Liquitex acrylics in fox red, gold, white and black. Then, I seal it with a waterproof acrylic clear coat for durability. The mask will come with black organza ribbons for wearing and a leather tab for hanging on the wall.

This is a signed, dated original.

name: Anubis Leather Mask
description:
This is a handmade leather mask based on the traditional depiction of Anubis, jackal-faced god of ancient Egypt. It is made entirely from one piece of 8oz leather, hand carved & shaped without molds or forms, then dyed & painted with colorfast acrylics in bright gold, red, royal blue & black. The mask is sealed with a clear-coat acrylic & is water resistant & safe to wear in any weather.

Signed, dated original. The mask comes with a suede tab for hanging and gold organza ties for wearing.

Anubis is the god of the underworld...a very serious fellow.

name: Brown/Gold Kitsune Leather Mask
description:
This is my own design based losely on the traditional Kyogen theater Kitsune (fox). This new design is slightly larger than my old kitsune and will fit most faces comfortably.

It is carved from one piece of leather & hand shaped, using no molds or forms. Then I painted it with a combination of colorfast Liquitex acrylics (in bright gold, red and black) & a water-based brown antique stain. The stain accentuates the natural grain of the leather & gives the whole mask the appearance of hand-finished wood. The entire mask is then sealed with a waterproof clear coat acrylic. Little imperfections are part of the charm of this piece...no two will be alike.

The mask will come with a suede loop for displaying on the wall & ties for wearing. You may request red, gold or black ties (if non are specified the artist gets to use whichever is handy).

name: Leather Koi Pin
description:
Here's a cute idea suggested by one of my customers; a tiny koi pin made of leather! I made this new design in a variety of warm sepia tones; red ochre and black spots on a neutral tan fish.  This listing is for one pin.

Each koi is meticulously carved & shaped by hand, then painted & sealed with acrylics. They are virtually waterproof & safe to wear in any weather, & they weigh practically nothing. I use 3 ounce leather for these, much thinner than the leather I use in my masks. They're created in the same manner, though, and are designed to be used & worn every day.

Each tiny fish is about four inches long (7cm), with a one and one-half inch pinback. There are slight variations in the markings on each koi.

Showa sanshoku koi (three-colored koi) are considered to be very good luck! Give someone (or yourself) the gift of good fortune.

name: Leather Ginkgo Leaf Barrette
description:
Here's a brand new item; a leather ginkgo barrette! 

Each ginkgo leaf is meticulously carved & shaped by hand, then painted & sealed with acrylics. They are virtually waterproof & safe to wear in any weather, & they weigh practically nothing. They are made of rather thick, durable leather, are entirely sealed (front and back), and are designed to be used & worn every day.

Each leaf is about three inches long (7cm), with a 50mm (about 2 inch) metal barrette firmly attached in back. This listing is for one ginkgo barrette.
